NowAboutPortfolio

My Web3 Product Portfolio

Here are some of my work, in the spirit of OnePage/OneHour+. Most things here belong to collective efforts. I share results, my thinking process, and projects as a Product Manager driving Web3 innovation. (Please don´t mind too much about the UI, I´m not a designer.)

Products Launched

NEWM Ecosystem – As the 1st full-time product manager, I implemented agile ceremonies, backlog grooming, and follow-ups across 5+ teams. I gathered teams with PRDs, fluid communication, and a solid roadmap.
NEWM Studio: Music Distribution – Most distribution services keep a percentage of streaming royalties. I launched this initiative to enable 100+ musicians to share songs on main streaming platforms while keeping 100% of royalties.
NEWM Marketplace: Royalties – No documented knowledge existed on what and how to build. I implemented small building cells (3 people) between product, design, and development with PRDs for understanding, agreement, ownership, and communication.
NEWM TheRecordStore: Collectibles – Users struggled to listen to songs and purchase them. I launched Version 2.0 with a clean UX flow, enabling listeners to find music and buy 150+ collectible items. Next challenge: success metrics.
NEWM Mobile App: Listening – Unified criteria on user journeys and pain points across Android and iOS teams. I oversaw UI implementation from a Product QA standpoint for a smooth UX.

Hackathons, Projects, Incubation, Pitches, and Documentation

Trust Pay @ Think and Dev – In this Web3 hackathon, I proposed an automated administration service for real-time payment tracking. Won a $100 clean code documentation prize.
Trust Pay @ Incubator: Brief – Won entry to a Web3 pre-seed incubator with a fee waiver. Built a B2B2C project for real-life payment scenarios.
Giver @ Pre-Seed Incubator Speezard – Talked with 10+ NGO founders/donors to address Latin America-specific donation continuity issues. Built a pitch deck and re-branded for sustained donor engagement.
Giver: 3-Minute Pitch @ ETH Event – Addressed low NGO engagement in Latin America. Won Quadratic funding for a Web3 event to engage more people with causes.
Giver: 5-Minute Pitch @ YouTube – Proposed a reputation system for Web3 NGOs to foster trust and collaboration. Recorded a pitch in Buenos Aires to engage users sustainably.

Challenges (Alone)

Vibrant @ Stellar Development Foundation [Web3] – Aimed to grow Latin America’s user base with a physical card backed by stablecoins. Feedback: Use metrics.
Colonist Mobile Gaming [Web2] – Improved UX flow with non-invasive user education nudges. Feedback: Use standardized metrics.
Point of Sale POS @ Alegra [Web2] – Planned a strategy to simplify user journeys for LatAm POS users, avoiding external FAQs.
